title: Should the name "faker" be censored? -_-
body:
Idk about the rest of the community, but Im sick and tired of hearing this guy's name!. As if he is sooooooooooooooooo great. NO

NO NO NO NO NO NO.

This is a team game. SKT is a team. Its not about individuals, and individuals cant win games(yea go try 1v5 and tell me how it goes). The poor support and other roles get no glory, despite them adding equal game impact, but thats ok Im just sick and tired of this glorified individual.

Censor it -_-
